articles.title: Singapore to resume travel from South Asia, eases measures for those from Malaysia, Indonesia - The Star Online
articles.description: Travellers from six countries that Singapore was previously closed off to will be allowed to enter here from Wednesday, as the nation continues to adjust border measures in response to the global Covid-19 situation.
